english.segment1: vs1. he was her first love. she was his first heartbreak. she didnt trust him. that was her second big mistake
english.segment2: she took a lover. she took the medicine. she took another. but all she thought about was him
english.segment3: and the smile that was on his face. as she walked away
english.segment4: ch. i miss you. i need to. cause when im back in your arms its twice as sweet
english.segment5: vs2. she threw her hair back. in a prophetic turn. it was expected. it was a swift and lovely blur
english.segment6: and compelled as she was to leave town. she was turning around
english.segment8: bridge. love is calling my name. love keep calling my name. love
